title: november 17: of mouse and man
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the invention of the mouse—no, not the animal, the computer tool! She discusses its inventor, its patent, and the process that led to one of our most ubiquitous tech items. Maia then chats about the youngest star to ever join the Hollywood Walk of Fame. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
